section.p: Contains pointers to a small subset of ICD-9CM codes which pertain to Audiology and Speech Pathology. Entries in this file are pointed to by the Diagnostic Code field in the A&SP Clinic Visit file. (file

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateEntered with data type Point In Time
The date the DIAGNOSTIC CONDITION was entered for the A&SP patient

Contains exactly one [1..1] diagnosis, where its type is Diagnosis
Identification of an A&SP condition through a method of consistent analysis.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateEntered with data type Point In Time
The date the DIAGNOSTIC CONDITION was entered for the A&SP patient

Contains exactly one [1..1] diagnosis, where its type is Diagnosis
Identification of an A&SP condition through a method of consistent analysis.
